Support Services, Counsellors and Apps

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”54px|0px|0|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Title” module_class=”title-body” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Roboto Condensed|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#616161″ header_font_size=”34px” header_letter_spacing=”10px” header_line_height=”38px” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Support Services, Counsellors and Apps

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Quote” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”30px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The following is a list of the regional support services, counsellors and apps. If you can recommend any other referral services in your region please feel free to contact us.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”75px|0px|27px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”|300|||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Support Services

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_padding=”21px|19px|21px|19px|true|true” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”8px” box_shadow_blur=”58px” box_shadow_spread=”-11px” box_shadow_color=”#e1e2e3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

1737

Feeling anxious, down, depressed or overwhelmed? You can talk to (or text) a trained counsellor through this free service.

Text: 1737
www.1737.org.nz
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_padding=”21px|19px|21px|19px|true|true” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”8px” box_shadow_blur=”58px” box_shadow_spread=”-11px” box_shadow_color=”#e1e2e3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Aunty Dee

If your problems are getting you down and you’re feeling confused, talk to Aunty Dee. She’s here to help you.
www.auntydee.co.nz
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_padding=”21px|19px|21px|19px|true|true” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”8px” box_shadow_blur=”58px” box_shadow_spread=”-11px” box_shadow_color=”#e1e2e3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

YOUTHLINE

You can call Youthline to talk about big or small stuff and they’re available 24/7.
Freephone: 0800 376 633
Text: 234
www.youthline.co.nz

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_padding=”21px|19px|21px|19px|true|true” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”8px” box_shadow_blur=”58px” box_shadow_spread=”-11px” box_shadow_color=”#e1e2e3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Safe to Talk

Free, confidential help and support for people affected by any type of sexual concerns or harm. Available 24/7 by phone, text, website, online chat and email.
Freephone: 0800 044 334
Text: 4334
Website/online chat: www.safetotalk.co.nz
Email: support@safetotalk.co.nz

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_padding=”21px|19px|21px|19px|true|true” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”8px” box_shadow_blur=”58px” box_shadow_spread=”-11px” box_shadow_color=”#e1e2e3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

LIFeLINE AOTEAROA

Want to speak to someone about how you’re feeling? Whether you’re stressed, lonely, depressed or unsure, you can call Lifeline 24/7 and speak with someone who can listen and help.
Freephone: 0800 543 354
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Apps for young people 


For help with changing porn habits

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/foritfy.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”50%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||15px|” border_radii=”on|35px|35px|35px|35px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_spread=”-11px” global_colors_info=”{}”] 
[/et_pb_image][et_pb_blurb title=”Fortify” url=”http://www.joinfortify.com/legacy” admin_label=”Fortify” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”20px” body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Fortify is a popular app designed for young people and adults. It offers daily tracking functions, discussion forums, journaling and mindfulness activities.

Age: Teens & adults

Cost: Free or Monthly ($16 monthly or $100 per year)

 Apple Store | Google Play

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/remojo.jpeg” title_text=”remojo” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”50%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||15px|” border_radii=”on|35px|35px|35px|35px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_spread=”-11px” global_colors_info=”{}”] 
[/et_pb_image][et_pb_blurb title=”REmojo” url_new_window=”on” admin_label=”Quit Addiction Buddy” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”20px” body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Remojo is an app for male-identifying young people offering filters, audio learning tracks, porn literacy info, daily tracking, online forums, and device management. ReMojo has an anti-porn focus, which may not be appropriate/helpful for some users.

Age: 18+
Cost: Plans from $3- 5 monthly,  free trial available and cancel anytime.

Website

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/nakedtruth-1.png” title_text=”nakedtruth” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”50%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||15px|” border_radii=”on|35px|35px|35px|35px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_spread=”-11px” global_colors_info=”{}”] 
[/et_pb_image][et_pb_blurb title=”The Naked Truth” url_new_window=”on” admin_label=”Quit Addiction Buddy” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”20px” body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

NakedTruth provides 8 week ‘recovery programmes,’ and an online support group programme, a video led learning course, partner support, and specific support groups for those from a faith background.  

Age: 18+
Cost: Free

Website

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/brainbuddy.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”50%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||15px|” border_radii=”on|35px|35px|35px|35px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_spread=”-11px” global_colors_info=”{}”] 
[/et_pb_image][et_pb_blurb title=”Brainbuddy” url_new_window=”on” admin_label=”Brainbuddy” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”20px” body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Brainbuddy is a more simple app focused on rewiring the brain through mindfulness exercises, games, meditation, lifestyle changes and understanding triggers. Some of the language used has an anti-porn focus, which may not be helpful for some users.

Age: 12+
Cost: 7-day free trial, $15 per month, cancel anytime.

Apple Store | Google Play

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/safesurfer.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”50%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||15px|” border_radii=”on|35px|35px|35px|35px” border_width_all=”21px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_spread=”-11px” global_colors_info=”{}”] 
[/et_pb_image][et_pb_blurb title=”SafeSurfer” url_new_window=”on” admin_label=”SafeSurfer” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”20px” body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SafeSurfer is a NZ based app which runs silently in the background and blocks porn on all major browsers.

Age: All ages
Cost: Free 7 day trial, $7.99 per month

Apple Store | Google Play

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”counselling” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_color=”#4b858e” custom_padding=”104px|0px|54px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font=”|300|||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” text_orientation=”center” inline_fonts=”Zooja Pro” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: Support Services, Counsellors and AppsSupport Services, Counsellors and AppsThe following is a list of the regional support services, counsellors and apps. If you can recommend any other referral services in your region please feel free to contact us.Support Services 1737 Feeling anxious, down, depressed or overwhelmed? You can talk to (or text) a trained counsellor […]
